mapper.select: SELECT MONTH(pay_date) AS month, SUM(IF(is_income = 0, money, 0)) AS money_out, SUM(IF(is_income = 1, money, 0)) AS money_in FROM payment_record WHERE YEAR(pay_date) = #{year} GROUP BY MONTH(pay_date) ORDER BY month
